# NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.collapsed

**Case**

The system displays the control’s options through a popover.

## Declaration

```swift
case collapsed
```

## Display styles

- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.automatic**: The system dynamically changes the display mode based on the available space.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.expanded**: The system displays the control and all of its options directly.
